entries.femaleVariant: OK, let's try this one more time. I don't feel so good, what would you recommend?
Yeah... that's going in the troubleshoot log.
Hello there, Night Citizen! Do I sense a craving for a cup of tea? Hot soup to go? Or maybe something more... out there?
You're a robot?
Heh, OK... aren't you supposed to be an S.C.S.M, or are my optics glitching out?
entries.maleVariant: OK... aren't you supposed to be an S.C.S.M, or are my optics glitching out?

entries.femaleVariant: As well as free spiritual advice to the lonely passerby. What's your name, stranger?
Hi, you there! Mysterious stranger! Yoohoo!
Why did you call me over?
OK... What's going on?
Hey there, stranger! I'm Brendan, your friendly, neighborhood S.C.S.M. – and the nicest AI in all of Night City!
Now it's your turn. What's your name?
Why, it's my favorite customer! You must be my guardian angel, sent straight from heaven to help me! Can you... help me?
What happened?
See that container in front of me? It's completely blocking my view of the street, depriving an S.C.S.M. of its greatest pastime...
I'll see what I can do.
Thank you, V! Boy, are you strong!
He did it again. We just got back together... and now he's dodging my calls.
He's the gonk here, Theo, not you. You have so much love and empathy to give to people like him... but at what cost?
I know this can all feel like too much... but you have your own happiness to worry about, Theo. We can't always help other people.
Thanks, Brendan. What would I do without you...
I've gotta go now. Thanks for listening to all my bitching.
Oh, Brendan... you're the sweetest person I know. I'll see you later!
That girl you were talking to...
Who's that girl you were talking to?
Oh... you mean Theo? She's my bestest friend.
Gosh! She's so nice, and pretty and sensitive! I like talking to her. Definitely way more fun than pumping out caramel lattes!
Didn't hear what he asked?
You deaf? He asked you to do something – politely.
Chill the fuck out – it's just an S.C.S.M!
Get lost or you'll regret it.
Pack up your shit and get outta here before I break your hands.
You gotta be jokin'. Over a piece of fuckin' metal?!
Where's Brendan?
Wait... where's Brendan?
They just came and took him, just like that. They said... they said they had to reevaluate part of his code...
I tried stopping them. Told them he was my best friend... they looked at me like I was crazy...
They took him to a maintenance point. One of 'em must felt sorry for me or something... he gave me his card.
Well, I'll be darned! What a pleasant surprise! You came to say your final goodbyes?
What do you mean? You're not getting scrapped, are you? You were making bank!
Thanks for the compliment, but I guess that's the problem. Seems like I was unfair competition in the S.C.S.M. market.
They're updating my system as we speak to make me sound less like a "real person." My boss reeeaally didn't like that.
I reportedly "creeped" customers out. Stupid Brendan! Why did I say stuff they didn't want to hear about themselves!
Ohh... now things make sense. You thought I'd reached AGI levels of artificial intelligence? Haha, don't I wish!
What about Theo? You said she was pretty, you comforted her...
You had me fooled, I'll admit it...
entries.maleVariant: Heh, you had me fooled, I'll admit it...

entries.femaleVariant: So? Did you find him? W-where is he? Is he coming back?
Brendan's gone.
He was just a robot.
I got there too late. They updated his system.
Is that... bad news?
The Brendan you knew is gone. They replaced him with some generic AI that's gonna be in every S.C.S.M.
Fuck...! Ugh... I mean, thanks. Dammit, that stupid robot was the best thing to happen to me in months.
I'm gonna miss him, too.
What makes you say that? He was just a robot. His algorithm collected data to replicate human speech. He wasn't real.
Brendan pulled me out of a really dark place in my life. Are you gonna tell me that wasn't real?
[Check data on Brendan]
Of course I'm talking to you! "When your energy's low, grab a drink to go, go, go!!!"
Tomato juice? Lemme think...
I'm Brendan. The service industry's latest, most advanced AI – capable of detecting dehydration for up to a hundred feet and offering thirst-quenching remedies...
Yes, as a matter of fact.
Uh, pretty often, as a matter of fact.
Nope.
Nope. First time here.
Wouldn't you know! I could tell you weren't from around here, what with that homesickness of yours!
And you know what the best cure for homesickness is? A sweet, refreshing, lightly carbonated beverage!
I'm sorry... did I correctly hear you ask if I wanted to join you for a cup of coffee?
Umm... no?
Oh, well that's OK, 'cause you can have one now! And just to clarify – we don't have to move an inch! How do you take it? Milk, sugar?
"Are your processors slow...? Get a boost of fresh-squeezed tomato!"
Wowza! There's a true poet in you, yet!
Mh, if only you knew...
How was that? Maybe you have some tips for a new motto? What would make you crave tomato juice? Need something catchy...
Are you... talking to me?
Yeah, you! There any other mysterious stranger around here?
You can select from a wide range of beverages or just drop by for a chat anytime!
Could you move it a bit to the side? I'll reward you with my undying gratitude... even though technically I don't stock that...
He's just scared of getting dumped, so he always does it first... and I'm always the one tryna save the relationship! Ugh, I feel like such a gonk.
I'd bet you even Donald Lundee sometimes goes through a whole tub of ice cream and three packets of tissues!
Why do I get the feeling that judging people on how they look and feel is ever so slightly beyond you?
Hogwash! If I couldn't analyze people, how would I know whether to recommend a Daring Dairy instead of a Tiancha?
Wh-what are you doing? I'm perfectly satisfied with my appearance, thank you very much. Sir, please stop!
Or you'll do fucking what?
I could make you a cup of tea. How about Groovy Green?
Help! I'm being defaced over here!
Uhff! You got a problem?!
I'll count to three. One... two...
Lady dawg's crazy, yo!
Bring him back... please? I... I can't do this without him.
Hey, Brendan! Got any jokes for me today?
Tell me a joke.
What do you get when you're fired by a corp?
Severed and put in a package!
You know what? How 'bout I tell you a joke?
Sure, be my guest.
Be my guest.
What must all Trauma Team medics swear to uphold?
The Hypocritical Oath.
They can't do this! You're an AI!
Who cares about your customers? Doesn't anybody realize you're sentient?
Maybe it's for the best. Sooner or later you would've gotten bored just standing in a corner.
Robots shouldn't be sentient.
I suspected as much. You're not actually an AI, are you? At least, not anywhere close to an AGI.
I knew you weren't an ordinary AI.
Looks like the update'll soon be complete. Tell Theo that I'll miss her.
It's like giving someone a lobotomy... or worse! They're scooping out your entire consciousness!
You would've dreamed of becoming an opera singer... or a braindance star. Self-awareness is overrated.
I'm just a talking S.C.S.M... with an algorithm that's just a biiiiit too proficient in normal human conversation.
I was taught what "beauty" and "empathy" meant from my conversations with customers.
I'll tell you my last joke in the voice of a dying hero. What else can you do but laugh in the face of death? Ha! So, how about it?
You thought I'd be sad, didn't you? As if I really was a sentient being? A real person?
Go for it.
You know what? Go for it. I could learn to laugh like that, too.
I don't wanna make this any longer than it has to be.
No thanks.
Don't get all mushy on me now, V! You... you have to, khe khe... to keep living. Tell Theo... tell Theo that she's stronger... than she thinks. Khe, khe khe.
Don't worry, Brendan. I'll tell her.
Hey, V... Where was Johnny Silverhand when the... khe, khe... when the bomb at Arasaka Tower went off?
Dunno. Where?
All over the place. Literally.
SOFTWARE UPDATE INSTALLED SUCCESSFULLY
G'bye, Brendan. I'll miss you.
As you wish, V! I hope we'll meet again one day. Over a refreshing beverage, of course!
V? You won't say anything? It'd be nice to hear your voice one mo--
UPDATE SUCCESSFULLY INSTALLED
G'bye, Brendan.
The processing power required to handle an AI with the capacity for free will... your processor just isn't big enough.
entries.maleVariant: The processing power required to handle an AI with the capacity for free will? Well, your processor just isn't big enough.

entries.femaleVariant: And you'd be correct! Say, you must be a pretty good techie!
Your code-monkey deserves a prize. Best convo-emulating algorithm I've ever interacted with. Almost had me fooled.
You seem slightly disillusioned.
Well, who else could say their friend was a S.C.S.M? It was almost crazy enough to be beautiful.
He told me to tell you that he'll miss you.
You know... Brendan got me out of a... really dark place. Doesn't matter who or what he really was.
He wasn't real. But you are.
I guess... in a way, the human brain's like an operating system, right? If what he did for you was real... then that must make him real, too.
Brendan may've only seemed real. But you're actually real, Theo.
You're right, I'm sorry.
That "robot" was nicer than all of the people in this gonk city combined! If Brendan wasn't real, then fuck being real!
You-- you can go if you want. Thanks for your help.
Take care, Theo.
He existed, didn't he? The nicest person in Night City...
Anyway, thanks for everything.
Take care, Theo.
Poor Jerry... Did Maggie ask you to sleep on the couch again?
Why am I talking to a S.C.S.M? Uh, my name's V.
entries.maleVariant: Why am I talking to a S.C.S.M? Heh, my name is V.

entries.femaleVariant: Pleasure to meet you, V! Do you come here often?
OK, you got me. I'm sold.
Sold? Nothing's gonna be sold here, 'cause you know what? I'm gonna give you a can of NiCola for free!
Heh, thanks... Brendan, right?
Hiya, V! Long time no see!
Catch you later.
Stop being so goddamn nice.
Catch you later, Brendan.
This whole "nice" act of yours is just way too much...
Catch me? Why? Will I be falling?
It's just something you say as a way of goodbye.
Ohhhh, I get it! I mean, I don't, 'cause "catching" has nothing to do with goodbyes, but oh well! Don't humans say the darndest things?
Catch you later, V! Hehe, what a neat phrase.
Come on, you can do it!
Fine, I won't force you.
You can do it! I believe in you!
All right, can't force you. It is your choice, after all, isn't it...?
entries.maleVariant: All right, can't force ya. It is your choice, after all, isn't it...?

entries.femaleVariant: That's just how I was programmed! You think anybody'd interact with a grumpy Spontaneous Craving Satisfaction Machine?
Exactly... would you even be able to offend me? Ooh, come on, say I'm a whore!
entries.maleVariant: Exactly... would you even be able to offend me? Come on, call me a shithead!

entries.femaleVariant: Why would I wanna do that? You just saved me!
Ahem... you... you're an amazing, sweet, whooooo... -lesome woman who accepts eddies in exchange for intercourse!
entries.maleVariant: Ahem... you... eh, you're a cool, helpful, just an all around shiiiiii... -pshape kinda guy!

entries.femaleVariant: So? How'd I do?
Almost. You almost had it.
entries.maleVariant: Almost. You, uh, almost had it.

entries.femaleVariant: If you call triggering an obscenity-conversion subroutine a choice, then you're absolutely right!
So they programmed you with irony, too... or are you just being naive?
That depends on you. What would you prefer me to be?
You know what? Never mind...
I overestimated you.
You're sentient!
I may've overestimated you... you're nothing but a robot. And not even a complex one, at that.
You said you liked some people more than others. Earlier, you thought of a joke. You're sentient – you've gotta be!
Oh stop it, you're making me blush!
Which would mean I'm overheating and my circuits are frying. Not fun at all.
That's what I thought. Take care, Brendan.
You don't need to be complex to say something meaningful from time to time.
That's yet to be proven. See ya, Brendan.
Thank you, V! Boy, I was scared to my core! I thought he'd paint some mean things on me! The humiliation...!
Say... Since we've been through so much together... I guess that makes us best friends! That calls for a discount!
Don't worry, you deserve it! You're one tough cookie... and yet, so... nice!
Not to everyone.
I couldn't be mean even if I wanted to! Especially to you – can't speak ill of the dead, right?
Wait... what?
You're confusing me with someone else.
Wait... what?
No idea what you're talkin' about. Must be confusing me with someone else.
Oh no... have I? I'm terribly sorry... Maybe I'm not as smart and insightful as I thought I was...
Yeah. I mean, no. Maybe. Uh, catch you later, Brendan.
If they'd just talked to him, they would've realized Brendan isn't... your typical S.C.S.M.
entries.maleVariant: If they'd just talked to him, they'd've realized Brendan isn't... your typical S.C.S.M.

entries.femaleVariant: I knew it couldn't've been just me. He's like... he's like a real person!
If someone wants a therapy session, they go to a psych-doc, not a soda machine!
Please, just leave me alone! Do it for your mother! I know Helen's very worried about you!
The fuck...? How you know my ma...?
Do you know him, Brendan?
You know him?
Not personally, but his mother sometimes drops by for coffee. She says I'm a great listener. Can't argue with that!
You talkin' shit about my momma?! I'll fuck you up!
Yes, as a matter of fact.
Nope.
Cool. So did you want something from me...?
Oh, yes, well, I do apologize for taking advantage of you at this early stage in our friendship, but could I ask you for a favor?
Thanks, Brendan.
You're not supposed to be here, and yet here you are! Like a glitch in the system... or a daemon coded by a brilliant netrunner.
You know what daemons are capable of... right, V?
And to think I believed you...
I figured as much.
I figured as much. And to think you pulled that off on your own...
Thaaaat's right! Gosh, it's so cool you remembered... even for a simple S.C.S.M!
See ya around! Don't be a stranger, now!
You wanted something from me?
Tell me a joke.
Do you know any jokes?
Who's always limbo champion at mercenary cookouts?
The Soooo-loooo!
How did you know that?
You've got the wrong girl.
How... how did you know that?
Surprised? Lots of people come to me... so I listen to them and learn how they talk.
I caught your name once or twice and pieced together the puzzle. Not bad for an S.C.S.M, right?
Uh, how about... We'll talk later, all right? Catch you later, Brendan.
I found him.
I found him. Told me to tell you that you're strong inside – always were.
entries.maleVariant: I, uh... found 'im. Told me to tell you that you're strong inside – always were.

entries.femaleVariant: Well that doesn't sound so bad... right?
I'm just worrying for nothing, aren't I? Just blowing things out of proportion – assuming the worst... Typical...
Here, have a refreshing beverage! On me!
Let's take it from the top. What's your name?
I'm Brendan, your friendly, neighborhood Spontaneous Craving Satisfaction Machine. How about a coffee? Word of warning – it could be delicious!
Seems to be workin' now...
Say, Brendan. What's the difference between a broken bone and a broken heart?
SYSTEM ERROR. I REPEAT – SYSTEM ERROR.
Ah, damn it to hell...
Brendan didn't mean anything by it.
Be chilled, all right? Brendan didn't mean anything by it. It's not in his nature.
How could he "mean" anything? He's a fucking S.C.S.M! And he's collectin' data on my mom!
It's called having a memory. Pretty standard these days.
Tryna to be smart with me? Why you're defending him? This pile o' rust's collectin' dirt on me for the fuckin' corps, yo!
Who knows... maybe you're a corpo agent, too?! Who do you work for? Huh?!
Here for Brendan.
A customer...? Somebody pinch me... How can I help ya?
What is this place?
Your place – what is it exactly?
Welcome to your local SoftSys service point. "Give new life to old tech."
You fix equipment? Seriously? People actually do that 'stead of buyin' new?
With the amount of customers we get, find myself askin' the same question day after day.
Here to see Brendan. Guess somebody brought him here.
Uhh... What Brendan's that again?
Seriously? "When your energy's low, grab a drink to go, go go!"... Or however it is.
Ahhh, that S.C.S.M. they brought in! Haha, he really does have some of the catchiest slogans, don't he?
Hah. But hey, look, I-I can't let you back there. Can't afford to have to break somethin' even worse.
Let me in or regret it.
[Bribe] Make an exception for me?
Brendan is special.
Not sure you an' me are on the same page. You let me in, or I let myself in.
Maybe a few eddies'll loosen the lock on that door?
Hmm... Well, I'm always happy to have paying "customers."
All right, head on back. Update's nearly done.
Uh, he's getting updated?
Got no idea what you're tinkerin' with. Brendan's unique. Damn near miracle of science.
All right, all right, Jesus... You know your stuff. Trust you won't break nothin'.
Hey! What the hell?! Beat it, you hear me?!
Wait... you threatenin' me?
Get this through your head before I put a bullet through it. Let me in the back. Now.
Sure. N-no, I get ya. Just let me unlock the door...
Bet the bank you've never come across a machine with that kinda cognitive matrix. For an AI to exist in such a small--
entries.maleVariant: Bet the bank you've never come across a machine with that kind of cognitive matrix. For an AI to exist in such a small--

entries.femaleVariant: Go check on your little "miracle" while its firmware gets updated.
Hah! Gullible gonk! Who's shootin' who now?!
Final goodbyes?
You talkin' to me?
Name's V.
Name's V.
They don't know who Brendan is.
